faq_subtitle: Everything you need to know about Bible study with Scriptura

items.question: What is Scriptura?
items.answer: Scriptura is an online platform designed to help users study the Bible in a deep and interactive way. With AI-powered insights, flexible tools, and a wide range of study materials, Scriptura makes Bible study easier and more personal.

items.question: Is Scriptura suitable for beginners?
items.answer: Absolutely. Scriptura is designed for all ages and provides an intuitive experience for beginners. At the same time, it offers enough depth for advanced users. From simple reading plans to deep theological insights, we have something for everyone.

items.question: Can I use Scriptura as a source of information?
items.answer: Scriptura is not a replacement for the Bible, nor is it an information source. It is a tool to help you study and understand the Bible. It offers AI support, interactive lessons, and a community of users who come together to help one another in studying Scripture.

items.question: What Bible translations are available on Scriptura?
items.answer: Currently, Scriptura provides access to several popular Bible translations, including the Statenvertaling, Herziene Statenvertaling, and the King James Version. We aim to add more translations in the future, depending on licensing availability.

items.question: How often is new content added to Scriptura?
items.answer: Scriptura's content is regularly expanded. We add new Bible studies, thematic courses, and learning materials weekly or monthly to support users in their spiritual development. Our goal is to always offer relevant and up-to-date resources.
